body_html:
Yep, working on the Gloo overload. Unfortunately Gloo needs to wrap a NCCL datatype [1], but there's no uint8 NCCL 1 datatype [2]. Still investigating...

[1] https://github.com/facebookincubator/gloo/blob/master/gloo/nccl/nccl.cu#L126-L130
[2] https://github.com/NVIDIA/nccl/blob/master/src/nccl.h#L99
body_text:
Yep, working on the Gloo overload. Unfortunately Gloo needs to wrap a NCCL datatype [1], but there's no uint8 NCCL 1 datatype [2]. Still investigating...
[1] https://github.com/facebookincubator/gloo/blob/master/gloo/nccl/nccl.cu#L126-L130
[2] https://github.com/NVIDIA/nccl/blob/master/src/nccl.h#L99
body:
Yep, working on the Gloo overload. Unfortunately Gloo needs to wrap a NCCL datatype [1], but there's no uint8 NCCL 1 datatype [2]. Still investigating...

[1] https://github.com/facebookincubator/gloo/blob/master/gloo/nccl/nccl.cu#L126-L130
[2] https://github.com/NVIDIA/nccl/blob/master/src/nccl.h#L99
